"},"buyBond(uint256,int256,uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"_amountIn":"is negative if specified in zcb quantity"}},"deactivateMarket(uint256,bool,bool,uint256)":{"params":{"resolve":"is true when instrument does not resolve prematurely"}},"setParameters((uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256),uint256,uint256)":{"details":"calculates market driven s from utilization rate. TODO do all possible trading functions "},"deactivateMarket(uint256,bool,bool,uint256)":{"notice":"Called when market resolves "},"denyMarket(uint256)":{"notice":"called by validator only"},"getCurrentMarketPhase(uint256)":{"notice":"returns whether current market is in phase  1: onlyReputable, which also means market is in assessment 2: not onlyReputable but in asseessment  3: in assessment but canbeapproved  4: post assessment(accepted or denied), amortized liquidity "},"getTraderBudget(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get trade budget = f(reputation), returns in collateral_dec sqrt for now"},"issuePoolBond(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"after assessment, let managers buy newly issued longZCB if the instrument is pool based  funds + funds * levFactor will be directed to the instrument "},"newMarket(uint256,address,address,address,string,bool)":{"notice":"parameters have to be set prior "},"redeem(uint256)":{"notice":"trader will redeem entire balance of ZCB Needs to be called at maturity, market needs to be resolved first(from controller)"},"redeemDeniedMarket(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"called by traders when market is denied before approval TODO ??? if the market is denied, this function is called and everything is redeemed  validator will need to call this on denial + isLong = true to redeem their collateral."},"redeemShortZCB(uint256)":{"notice":"called by short buyers when market is resolved for fixed term instruments "},"setParameters((uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256),uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"list of parameters in this system for each market, should vary for each instrument "},"tradeCallBack(uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"called by pool when buying, transfers funds from trader to pool "},"validatorApprove(uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"notice":"called when the validator votes to approve the market => stakes vt + recieves discounted ZCB the staked amount goes to the controller approveMarket(uint256).details: if market is alive and market is not during assessment, it is approved.

params._amountIn: is negative if specified in zcb quantity

params.resolve: is true when instrument does not resolve prematurely

setParameters((uint256,uint256,uint256,u.details: calculates market driven s from utilization rate. If u-r high,  then s should be low, as 1) it disincentivizes  managers to approving as more proportion of the profit goes to the LP, and 2) disincentivizes the borrower  to borrow as it lowers approved principal and increases interest rate

params._amountIn: : amount of short trader is willing to buy

_canIssue(address,int256,uint256).notice: whether new longZCB can be issued

approveMarket(uint256).notice: main approval function called by controller

buyBond(uint256,int256,uint256,bytes).notice: main entry point for longZCB buys (during assessment for now)

claimFunnel(uint256,uint16,uint256).notice: general limitorder claim + liquidity provision funnels used post-assessment,  which will be recorded if necessary  param type: 1 if open long, 2 if close long, 3 if open short, 4 if close short type 5: partially claim , TODO do all possible trading functions

getCurrentMarketPhase(uint256).notice: returns whether current market is in phase  1: onlyReputable, which also means market is in assessment 2: not onlyReputable but in asseessment  3: in assessment but canbeapproved  4: post assessment(accepted or denied), amortized liquidity

getTraderBudget(uint256,address).notice: get trade budget = f(reputation), returns in collateral_dec sqrt for now

issuePoolBond(uint256,uint256).notice: after assessment, let managers buy newly issued longZCB if the instrument is pool based  funds + funds * levFactor will be directed to the instrument

newMarket(uint256,address,address,addres.notice: parameters have to be set prior

redeem(uint256).notice: trader will redeem entire balance of ZCB Needs to be called at maturity, market needs to be resolved first(from controller)

redeemDeniedMarket(uint256,bool).notice: called by traders when market is denied before approval TODO ??? if the market is denied, this function is called and everything is redeemed  validator will need to call this on denial + isLong = true to redeem their collateral.

redeemShortZCB(uint256).notice: called by short buyers when market is resolved for fixed term instruments

setParameters((uint256,uint256,uint256,u.notice: list of parameters in this system for each market, should vary for each instrument

tradeCallBack(uint256,bytes).notice: called by pool when buying, transfers funds from trader to pool

validatorApprove(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: called when the validator votes to approve the market => stakes vt + recieves discounted ZCB the staked amount goes to the controller while the discounted ZCB goes to the market manager.
